theWizard:Canteen.NAME: Canteen
theWizard:Canteen.FLAVOR: A Canteen full of water of Mana.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat , add #b2 #yupgraded #yMana to your hand.

theWizard:IceCube.NAME: Ice Cube
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of each turn , enemies lose at most 15 Cold.

theWizard:GoldenCanteen.NAME: Golden Canteen
DESCRIPTIONS: Replaces #yCanteen. Gain [E] at the start of your turn.

theWizard:Cloak.NAME: Cloak
theWizard:Cloak.FLAVOR: It can harden to block damage.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever a Mcost effect triggers , gain #b4 Block.

theWizard:ColdCoin.NAME: Cold Coin
theWizard:ColdCoin.FLAVOR: The richer the owner is , the colder it is.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of turn , Apply #b1 Cold to ALL enemies for every #b100 gold you have.

theWizard:AirConditioner.NAME: Air Conditioner
theWizard:AirConditioner.FLAVOR: A high-tech thing from the future. Seems that it can lower the temperature.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you apply #yCold to enemies , apply 1 additional #yCold.

theWizard:CrystalBall.NAME: Crystal Ball
theWizard:CrystalBall.FLAVOR: You can't see the scene in it clearly.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you are going to gain Block , skip that and apply #yCold of the same amount to the enemy with the lowest #yCold. You no longer take non-attack damage ( #yThorns etc. ).

theWizard:MagicHammer.NAME: Magic Hammer
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat , #yupgrade ALL cards in your hand. (Only in this combat)

theWizard:DarkMagicBook.NAME: Dark Magic Book
theWizard:DarkMagicBook.FLAVOR: You can't control the strong magic power inside it.
DESCRIPTIONS: #yMana will be #yUnplayable. Gain [E] at the start of your turn.

theWizard:MagicHat.NAME: Magic Hat
theWizard:MagicHat.FLAVOR: You can put everything in it.
DESCRIPTIONS: If you do not play any #yAttacks during your turn, retain your hand this turn.

theWizard:ToyBattery.NAME: Toy Battery
theWizard:ToyBattery.FLAVOR: You have no idea about it. Is it magic?
DESCRIPTIONS: Increase your max hand size by #b1 .
